# Data Source: honeycombio_slo

The `honeycombio_slo` data source retrieves the details of a single SLO.  
If you want to retreive multiple SLOs, use the `honeycombio_slos` data source instead.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Retrieve the details of a single SLO
data "honeycombio_slo" "myslo" {
  id      = "fS4WfA82ACt"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The ID of the SLO to fetch.

### Optional

- `dataset` (String, Deprecated) The dataset to fetch the SLO from.

### Read-Only

- `datasets` (List of String) The datasets the SLO is evaluated on.
- `description` (String) The SLO's description.
- `name` (String) The name of the SLO.
- `sli` (String) The alias of the Derived Column used as the SLO's SLI.
- `tags` (Map of String) A map of tags associated with the resource.
- `target_percentage` (Number) The percentage of qualified events expected to succeed during the `time_period`.
- `time_period` (Number) The time period, in days, over which the SLO is evaluated.
